exercises.question: Translate: I play with my pen
Translate: Your sofa is blue
Translate: He loves his book
Translate: We love your car
Translate: My father has my ball
Translate: Your mother plays with your watch
exercises.answer: deine mutter spielt mit deiner uhr

exercises.question: Translate: I love our watch
Translate: I love her watch
Translate: I love your (formal) pen
Translate: You (formal) play with your pen
Translate: Your mother loves your pen
Translate: His father has his watch
Translate: Their mother comes with their car
exercises.answer: ihre mutter kommt mit ihrem auto

exercises.question: Translate: Her mother is Ankita
Which is correct for Dative Maskulin: (meinen/meinem)
Which is correct for Akkusativ Maskulin: (seinen/seinem)
Which is correct for Nominativ Feminin: (unsere/unseren)
Translate: He comes with our car
Translate: We love their watch
Translate: Your (formal) father has your car
